```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(ggpubr)
library(tidyr)
library(scales)
library(rstatix)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)

plik_dane_do_analizy <- "PHPT.RDS"

if (file.exists(plik_dane_do_analizy)) {
  PHPT <- readRDS(plik_dane_do_analizy)
} else {
  stop(sprintf("Nie znaleziono pliku: `%s`. Uruchom notatnik przygotowujący zbiór danych!", plik_dane_do_analizy))
}


# zmienne <- c("fracture", "nicotine_dependence")
# PHPT[zmienne] <- lapply(PHPT[zmienne], function(x) ifelse(x == "Y", 1, 0))


PHPT$fracture_bin <- ifelse(PHPT$fracture == "Y", 1, 0)
PHPT$nicotine_dependence_bin <- ifelse(PHPT$nicotine_dependence == "Y", 1, 0)
PHPT$sex_bin <- ifelse(PHPT$sex == "K", 1, 0)

```



## Z jakimi cechami wiązało się występowanie zlamań w modelu logistycznym?
``` {r}
model <- glm(fracture_bin ~ group + sex_bin + age + nicotine_dependence_bin + Ca + iPTH + Tscore_femur_neck + Tscore_femur_total + Tscore_lumbar + TBS, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model)
# OR
exp(coef(model))
# przedziały ufności 95%:
exp(confint(model))
```

## Model 0 

```{r}
model0 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ 1, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model0)
exp(coef(model0))
exp(confint(model0))
BIC(model0)
```


## Model 1 

```{r}
model1 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model1)
exp(coef(model1))
exp(confint(model1))
BIC(model0, model1)
```

## Model 2

```{r}
model2 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age + sex_bin, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model2)
exp(coef(model2))
exp(confint(model2))
BIC(model0, model1, model2)
```

## Model 3

```{r}
model3 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age * sex_bin , data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model3)
exp(coef(model3))
exp(confint(model3))
BIC(model0, model1, model2, model3)
```

## Model 4

```{r}
model4 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age + sex_bin + group, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model4)
exp(coef(model4))
exp(confint(model4))
BIC(model0, model1, model2, model3, model4)
```

## Model 5

```{r}
model5 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age + sex_bin + group + TBS, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model5)
exp(coef(model5))
exp(confint(model5))
BIC(model0, model1, model2, model3, model4, model5)
```

## Model 5B

```{r}
model5B <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age * sex_bin + TBS, data = dplyr::filter(PHPT, group=="B"), family = binomial)
summary(model5B)
exp(coef(model5B))
exp(confint(model5B))
BIC(model5B)
```


## Model 5K

```{r}
model5K <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age * sex_bin + TBS, data = dplyr::filter(PHPT, group=="K"), family = binomial)
summary(model5K)
exp(coef(model5K))
exp(confint(model5K))
BIC(model5K)
```

## Model 6

```{r}
model6 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age + sex_bin + group + TBS + nicotine_dependence_bin + Ca + iPTH, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model6)
exp(coef(model6))
exp(confint(model6))
BIC(model0, model1, model2, model3, model4, model5, model6)
```


## Model 7

```{r}
model7 <-  glm(fracture_bin ~ age + sex_bin + group + TBS + nicotine_dependence_bin + Ca + iPTH + BMD_neck, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model7)
exp(coef(model7))
exp(confint(model7))
BIC(model0, model1, model2, model3, model4, model5, model6, model7)
```

```{r}
model8 <- glm(fracture_bin ~ age + sex_bin + TBS + nicotine_dependence_bin + Ca + iPTH + Tscore_femur_neck + Tscore_femur_total + Tscore_lumbar, data = PHPT, family = binomial)
summary(model8)
exp(coef(model8))
```

